tool_description: Extracts relevant keywords, phrases, and entities from processed queries to enhance search accuracy and enable targeted knowledge base matching.

processed_query.description: The preprocessed query text from Query Preprocessor

max_keywords.description: Maximum number of keywords to extract (1-20)

include_phrases.description: Whether to include multi-word phrases in extraction

min_relevance.description: Minimum relevance threshold for keyword inclusion (0-1)

error_messages: Empty processed query error: The processed_query parameter cannot be empty.
Invalid max_keywords error: max_keywords must be between 1 and 20.
Invalid relevance threshold error: min_relevance must be between 0 and 1.
Extraction failure error: Unable to extract meaningful keywords from the provided query.
usage: Input a preprocessed query and configure extraction parameters. The tool returns ranked keywords and phrases with relevance scores.

entities.description: Named entities identified in the query

keyword_scores.description: Relevance scores corresponding to extracted keywords
